snippet: Overuse of narcotics and addiction are an issue, but emergency physicians often lack the training and tools to effectively help patients complaining of tooth pain and seeking prescription painkillers.
abstract: Emergency department physicians often lack the training and tools to effectively help patients who come in complaining of tooth pain; ER doctors not only lack dental tools and training, but it is known that many such patients are using tooth pain as a ruse to get prescriptions for narcotic painkillers.
lead_paragraph: Overuse of narcotics and addiction are an issue, but emergency physicians often lack the training and tools to effectively help patients complaining of tooth pain and seeking prescription painkillers.

headline.seo: Emergency Room Doctors, Dental Patients and Drugs
headline.main: E.R. Doctors Face Quandary on Painkillers
headline.print_headline: E.R. Doctors Face Dilemma On Painkillers
